author: Brittany Shammas
title: U.S. children less likely than adults to get very ill from coronavirus, CDC study suggests - The Washington Post
description: U.S. children less likely than adults to get very ill from coronavirus, CDC study suggests The Washington Post CDC says three kids have died from suspected coronavirus in US as some children get severely sick CNBC Flu facts from the experts The Dallas Morning…
content: The CDC said its findings seemed to support an earlier study on pediatric cases in China, which found that covid-19, the disease caused by the coronavirus, might be less severe in children. The CDC researchers cautioned, however, that the information was inco… [+4509 chars]
